nodes.text: Horan was a male Human who served as a Lieutenant in the Republic Military during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Carrick Station. During the Revanite crisis, Horan was stationed on Yavin 4 to support the Yavin Coalition.

Lieutenant Horan appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as one of many Modification Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though he was later relabeled as a Level 56 Modification Commendations Vendor.
With the expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, Horan appears as a level 56 Modification Vendor on Yavin 4.
With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Horan now also appears on a number of worlds in the place of the original armor, weapon, and mods vendors.
